TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SiteIdentityPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class SiteIdentityPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 允許將 的安全性動作套用至使用宣告式安全性的程式碼。

span.span: Allows security actions for to be applied to code using declarative security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從 Url 使用 HTTP、 HTTPS 和 FTP 的通訊協定的程式碼只定義網站身分識別。Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP. 站台是之間的字串"/ /"之後的 URL 和下列通訊協定"/"，如果有的話，例如，在 URL 中的 www.fourthcoffee.com http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm。A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, www.fourthcoffee.com in the URL http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm. 這會排除連接埠號碼。This excludes port numbers. 如果指定的 URL 是http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/，站台是 www.fourthcoffee.com，不 www.fourthcoffee.com:8000。If a given URL is http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/, the site is www.fourthcoffee.com, not www.fourthcoffee.com:8000. 站台可以完全相符，或者使用萬用字元 ("\*") 在點分隔符號的前置詞。Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，站台名稱字串 \*。 fourthcoffee.com 符合 fourthcoffee.com，以及 www.fourthcoffee.com。For example, the site name string \*.fourthcoffee.com matches fourthcoffee.com as well as www.fourthcoffee.com. 不使用萬用字元，網站名稱必須是精確的比對。Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match. 站台名稱字串 \* 會比對任何站台，但不是會符合任何網站辨識項的程式碼。The site name string \* will match any site, but will not match code that has no site evidence. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不會使用身分識別的權限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，於身分識別的權限的需求會生效，即使在呼叫組件是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是說，雖然呼叫組件具有完全信任，但是，如果組件不符合要求的準則識別權限的要求即會失敗。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，身分識別的權限的需求是沒有效果，如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 如此可確保所有的權限，不會將身分識別的權限的特殊案例的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. 允許宣告的範圍取決於用。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the that is used. 安全性屬性所宣告的安全性資訊會儲存屬性目標的中繼資料，並在執行階段存取系統。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全性屬性僅用於宣告式安全性。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 命令式安全性，使用對應的權限類別。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class.

related.span: 使用屬性擴充中繼資料

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction action) cil managed

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

summary.span: 建立並傳回 的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates and returns a new instance of .
A that corresponds to this attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法只應該由安全性系統中，永遠不會由應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method should only be called by the security system, never by application code. 在編譯時期，屬性會將安全性宣告轉換為中繼資料的序列化形式。At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata. 在中繼資料中的宣告式安全性資料時建立的權限，此方法會傳回對應至這個屬性。Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Site { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Site : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定呼叫程式碼的站台名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the site name of the calling code.

value.span: 與安全性提供者指定的站台名稱進行比較的站台名稱。

span.span: The site name to compare against the site name specified by the security provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從 Url 使用 HTTP、 HTTPS 和 FTP 的通訊協定的程式碼只定義網站身分識別。Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP. 站台是之間的字串"/ /"之後的 URL 和下列通訊協定"/"，如果有的話，例如，在 URL 中的 www.fourthcoffee.com http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm。A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, www.fourthcoffee.com in the URL http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm. 這會排除連接埠號碼。This excludes port numbers. 如果指定的 URL 是http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/，站台是 www.fourthcoffee.com，不 www.fourthcoffee.com:8000。If a given URL is http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/, the site is www.fourthcoffee.com, not www.fourthcoffee.com:8000. 站台可以完全相符，或者使用萬用字元 ("\*") 在點分隔符號的前置詞。Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，站台名稱字串 \*。 fourthcoffee.com 符合 fourthcoffee.com，以及 www.fourthcoffee.com。For example, the site name string \*.fourthcoffee.com matches fourthcoffee.com as well as www.fourthcoffee.com. 不使用萬用字元，網站名稱必須是精確的比對。Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match.
